definition: thorn/sting/thrust/to prick/to pierce/to stab/to assassinate/to murder
broken/damaged/worn out/lousy/rotten/to break, split or cleave/to get rid of/to destroy/to break with/to defeat/to capture (a city etc)/to expose the truth of

sentences.english: Each is brought to the ring and allowed to attack a picador who pricks them with a lance.
sentences.chinese: 每个提请环，并允许攻击皮卡多尔谁用长矛刺破他们。

sentences.english: 192】:Time doth transfix the flourish set on youth.
sentences.chinese: 时间会刺破青春的华丽精致。

sentences.english: In the dark I see a ray piercing the sky.
sentences.chinese: 暗夜里我看见一线光刺破天空。

sentences.english: Time doth transfix the flourish set on youth.
sentences.chinese: 时间会刺破青春的华丽精致。

sentences.english: Make sure the wood screws aren't too long and penetrate the plastic liner.
sentences.chinese: 注意木螺钉不要太长，以免刺破塑料膜。

sentences.english: They suffer from mouth infection and their poison gland is punctured.
sentences.chinese: 它们的毒腺往往也被刺破。

sentences.english: The sword glanced off the shield and did not damage it.
sentences.chinese: 剑擦过盾牌，没有刺破它。

sentences.english: A poplar pierced up into the dark-blue sky and touched a white star there.
sentences.chinese: 一棵白杨树刺破暗兰色的天空，碰到一颗白星。

sentences.english: Pull teether in all directions, and replace when worn, damaged or punctured.
sentences.chinese: 咬牙拉在各个方向，并更换时磨损，损坏或刺破。

sentences.english: The ship’s running lights pinpointed the dark.
sentences.chinese: 船上的探照灯光刺破黑暗。

sentences.english: He was taken to hospital with a punctured lung.
sentences.chinese: 他因肺部被刺破而送进医院。

sentences.english: Far into the night the distant honk of a single goose pierces the darkness.
sentences.chinese: 到了深夜，一只孤雁远远的鸣叫声刺破了黑暗。

sentences.english: Unexpectedly, through the darkness shot a pair of piercingly bright, glowing green eyes.
sentences.chinese: 突然两道亮光刺破黑暗，它们来自一对发亮的绿眼。

sentences.english: The car's headlights pierced the gloom of darkness.
sentences.chinese: 汽车的前灯刺破了阴森森的黑夜。

sentences.english: Pierce each piece of chicken with the fork. Press it and move it around the pan in order to absorb the sugar.
sentences.chinese: 用叉子将鸡块刺破，按着在锅中来回移动以吸收糖分。

sentences.english: Hard plastic enema tips can perforate the rectum .
sentences.chinese: 硬的塑料灌肠嘴会刺破直肠。

definition: to cut open/to rip/to streak across (lightning, meteor etc)/to pierce (scream, searchlight etc)
to wear out (clothes)/to pierce (a membrane etc)
to puncture/to pierce/(fig.) to destroy (the facade concealing an unpleasant reality)
to hit with a piercing blow
to penetrate/to pierce/to see clearly/to have an insight into
